verses.verse: The aged <S%G4247>women<s%> <S%G5615>likewise<s%>, <S%G3361>that<s%> they be <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2688>behavior<s%> as becomes <S%G2412>holiness<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> false <S%G1228>accusers<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1402>given<s%> to <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%>, teachers of good <S%G2567>things<s%>;
<S%G2443>That<s%> they may <S%G4994>teach<s%> the young <S%G3501>women<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4994>sober<s%>, to love their <S%G5362>husbands<s%>, to love their <S%G5388>sons<s%>,

To be <S%G4998>discreet<s%>, <S%G53>chaste<s%>, keepers at <S%G3626>home<s%>, <S%G18>good<s%>, <S%G5293>obedient<s%> to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G987>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%>.

<S%G5199>Sound<s%> <S%G3056>speech<s%>, that cannot be <S%G176>condemned<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> he that <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1537>in<s%> <S%G1727>opposition<s%> to you may be <S%G1788>ashamed<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> evil <S%G5337>thing<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>.

Exhort <S%G1401>servants<s%> to be <S%G5293>obedient<s%> unto their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1203>masters<s%>, and <S%G1511>to<s%> please them <S%G2101>well<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3361>things<s%>; not answering <S%G483>again<s%>;
